title: CHROMA SKIN LEAK???
body: so i was messing around and saw that rocket girl tristana had chroma pack available??? Not sure if this was a leak but it sure looks like one.

replies.body: If it was on PBE, high chance, if not, no not really.

Even if it was a leak, it wouldn't be on the **official league client**.

*facepalm*
Go check it then, unless your chicken.

Oh lordy.

You don't **leak** something, ON THE OFFICIAL CLIENT.

If it's on the client, then it's not being _leaked_. Your grasp of common words relate more to a chicken than anything else here. -.-"

A leak can be described as something secret or unknown becoming known. it was never mentioned that the tristana skin was getting a chroma, therefore, it is a leak. call it what you want, just understand what it is.

I was calling you a chicken so you would actually check the damned thing, because when you said it could not be a leak, I thought you were implying that it could not exist. check your wording better, or be more descriptive of your meaning from here on.

a question that you make me want to ask though, is if it is not a leak, what in gods name is it? because it is a leak.

Nooooo. Even if it was accidentally slipped into the actual league client, they would have released a follow-up patch to remove it. It's probably just Photoshop.

That would be a good chroma skin, though.
i took the screenshot directly form the lol client. if you own the skin, check it out!
It's there. i noticed it too.

I checked as well, and it's there. That's interesting. And awesome :)

Sorry about the doubt... I thought you had meant that you found it somewhere online and not in the client yourself.
It's there on the live server. I think it's for hype and maybe leak. Either one looks like they're making a chroma rocket girl Tristana!
On PBE there is indeed a Chroma option wheel onoRocket Girl Tristana but there are no actual Chromas released or yet announced for this skin.
I dont think it was a leak considering it was on the PBE too, maybe it was just there to hype the players?
